summary: Implemented Zorn's lemma proof structure for exists_fullySaturated_extension. Phases 1-3 (define S, box_coherence_sUnion, chain upper bounds) and Phase 5 (apply Zorn, construct result) are complete. Phase 4 (maximality implies saturation) has one sorry for the coherent witness construction.

artifacts.summary: Implementation summary documenting completed phases and remaining sorry

completion_data.completion_summary: Implemented Zorn's lemma proof structure for FamilyCollection.exists_fullySaturated_extension. Added box_coherence_pred definition and box_coherence_sUnion lemma. Phases 1-3 and 5 complete; Phase 4 has sorry for coherent witness construction which requires sophisticated witness construction to preserve box_coherence.
